from modifier import Modifier
from ..stream import StreamInstance

[docs]class First(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(First, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'data_gen': 'data', 'doc_gen': 'doc'}


[docs]    def execute(self, data):
        for d in data:
            return d
        return None




[docs]class Last(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Last, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'data_gen': 'data', 'doc_gen': 'doc'}


[docs]    def execute(self, data):
        res = None
        for d in data:
            res = d
        return res




[docs]class Head(Modifier):
    def __init__(self, n):
        super(Head, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'data_gen': 'data_gen', 'doc_gen': 'doc_gen'}
        self.n = n


[docs]    def execute(self, data):
        i = 0
        for d in data:
            i += 1
            if i > self.n:
                break
            yield d




[docs]class Tail(Modifier):
    def __init__(self, n):
        super(Tail, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'data_gen': 'data_gen', 'doc_gen': 'doc_gen'}
        self.n = n


[docs]    def execute(self, data):
        tail = ()
        for d in data:
            tail = (tail + (d,))[-self.n:]
        for d in tail:
            yield d

#     def __init__(self):
#         super(Data, self).__init__()

#

#         for (time, data) in doc_gen:
#             yield data



[docs]class Time(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Time, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc_gen': 'data_gen'}


[docs]    def execute(self, doc_gen):
        for (time, data) in doc_gen:
            yield time




[docs]class IData(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(IData, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc': 'data'}


[docs]    def execute(self, doc):
        (time, data) = doc
        return data




[docs]class ITime(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(ITime, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc': 'data'}


[docs]    def execute(self, doc):
        (time, data) = doc
        return time



# class List(Modifier):
#     def __init__(self):
#         super(List, self).__init__()
#         self.types = {'data_gen': 'data', 'doc_gen': 'data'}
#
#     def execute(self, data):
#         return list(data)



[docs]class Component(Modifier):
    def __init__(self, key):
        super(Component, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc_gen': 'doc_gen'}
        self.key = key


[docs]    def execute(self, doc_gen):
        for (time, data) in doc_gen:
            if self.key in data:
                yield StreamInstance(time, data[self.key])




[docs]class ComponentFilter(Modifier):
    def __init__(self, key, values):
        super(ComponentFilter, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc_gen': 'doc_gen'}
        self.key = key
        self.values = values


[docs]    def execute(self, doc_gen):
        for (time, data) in doc_gen:
            try:
                if data[self.key] in self.values:
                    yield StreamInstance(time, data)
            except KeyError:
                pass




[docs]class DeleteNones(Modifier):
    def __init__(self):
        super(DeleteNones, self).__init__()
        self.types = {'doc_gen': 'doc_gen'}


[docs]    def execute(self, doc_gen):
        for (time, data) in doc_gen:
            data2 = {}
            for (key, value) in data.items():
                if value is not None:
                    data2[key] = value
            yield StreamInstance(time, data2)
